Class MatchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • thmuggleton.controller.MatchController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener, ChangeListener, Controller

    public class MatchController
extends Object
implements Controller, ChangeListener
    Controls interaction with the bowling match model and view objects.
    Author:
    Thomas Muggleton
